meanings.definition: The quality of being serious and sensible in behavior.
meanings.sent1: Her sobersidedness during the meeting impressed everyone with her maturity.
meanings.sent2: His sobersidedness at the funeral showed his respect for the solemn occasion.
meanings.sent3: Despite his usual playfulness, his sobersidedness at the library was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The sobersidedness of the judge's gaze made the defendant realize the seriousness of the situation.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's sobersidedness in handling the classroom made a lasting impression on the students.

meanings.sent1: The sobersidedness of the priest during the ceremony brought a sense of reverence to the room.
meanings.sent2: Her sobersidedness at the memorial service reflected the somber mood of the occasion.
meanings.sent3: Despite the festive atmosphere, his sobersidedness at the party was quite unexpected.
meanings.sent4: The sobersidedness of the old oak tree in the graveyard seemed to echo the solemnity of the place.
meanings.sent5: The sobersidedness of the painting conveyed a sense of deep contemplation to the viewers.
